Browser HTML5 Element Showcase

This fixture is designed to exercise parser, layout, and text rendering paths with a broad set of semantic and inline elements.

Structure Lists Tables Forms Media Inline

Document Structure

Article Example

Articles, sections, asides, and footers are represented as explicit blocks so visual nesting is easy to inspect.

Aside content: secondary notes, warnings, and helper context for the primary content flow.

Section footer with metadata and source hints.
